title: 服务端停止响应，求看一下是怎么回事
author: q1170695169
txt_content:
The server has stopped responding!
[23:34:35] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Please report this to http://www.spigotmc.org/
[23:35:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and Minecraft crash reports
[23:36:25] [Thread-2428/WARN]: Exception in thread "Thread-2428" 
[23:38:31] [Thread-2456/WARN]: Exception in thread "Thread-2456" 
[23:38:48] [Async Chat Thread - #84/INFO]: [0;33;1m<[0;33;22m[0;32;22ml_coser[0;33;1m> [0;37;22m沙卡拉卡[m
[23:38:48] [Thread-2456/WARN]: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
[23:38:48] [Thread-2456/WARN]:         at java.nio.HeapByteBuffer.<init>(Unknown Source)
[23:38:41] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Spigot version: git-PaperSpigot-88857d9 (MC: 1.7.10)
[23:38:59] [Thread-2456/WARN]:         at java.nio.ByteBuffer.allocate(Unknown Source)
[23:39:02] [Thread-2456/WARN]:         at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.<init>(Unknown Source)
[23:39:07] [Thread-2456/WARN]:         at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.<init>(Unknown Source)
[23:39:07] [Thread-2456/WARN]:         at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.forOutputStreamWriter(Unknown Source)
[23:39:08] [Thread-2456/WARN]:         at java.io.OutputStreamWriter.<init>(Unknown Source)
[23:39:08] [Thread-2456/WARN]:         at java.io.PrintWriter.<init>(Unknown Source)
[23:39:08] [Thread-2456/WARN]:         at Deadhunger.KV5M.run(KV5M.java:59)
[23:39:08] [Thread-2456/WARN]:         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[23:38:59] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: ------------------------------
[23:39:09] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Server thread dump (Look for plugins here before reporting to Spigot!):
[23:39:09] [Server thread/INFO]: l_lei lost connection: Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: 你的主机中的软件中止了一个已建立的连接。

看不太懂。最后看了下，貌似服务器cpu在一段时间吃满了，服务器是4核心，只开了1个服务端，却吃满了……我不知道什么情况。求解

replies.author: q1170695169
replies.txt_content:
xujh 发表于 2016-7-1 05:13
内存不够。
内存就用了4G,服务器内存8g

replies.author: xujh
replies.txt_content:
q1170695169 发表于 2016-7-1 07:14
内存就用了4G,服务器内存8g
启动脚本把最大内存加到6G试试
-Xmx6g

还有，如果你装了ＥＳＳ插件，控制台输入到gc ,看看内存使用情况。

[07:22:25 INFO]: CONSOLE issued server command: /gc
[07:22:25 INFO]: 运行时间: 1 小时 4 分钟 42 秒
[07:22:25 INFO]: 当前 TPS = 19.98
[07:22:25 INFO]: 最大内存: 10,240 MB.
[07:22:25 INFO]: 已分配内存: 4,096 MB.
[07:22:25 INFO]: 空闲内存: 2,415 MB

replies.author: q1170695169
replies.txt_content:
xujh 发表于 2016-7-1 07:17
启动脚本把最大内存加到6G试试
-Xmx6g
我是这样设置的java -XX:MaxPermSize=128M -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseCompressedOops -jar paperspigot-1.7.10-R0.1-20150831-13.jar
还有，我看了下，貌似是领地插件一只刷报错来着，然后我更新到最新版本，原来的领地就失效了！吓得我赶紧换了回来……

replies.author: 翼LOVE·小爱
replies.txt_content: 请提供The server has stopped responding!以上的记录

replies.author: q1170695169
replies.txt_content:
